Analyze the following text: A data transmitting and receiving method in which a master device 101 and a plurality of slave devices 102103501502 are provided and the plurality of slave devices 102103501502 are connected to a common medium 105 and perform communication with the master device 101 wherein a slave device 104503 which desires to enter a communication system transmits an association request message as a message for requesting to allow an entrance to the master device 101 in a period during which the slave device 104503 performs transmission and the master device 101 performs reception wherein the master device 101 allows the slave device 104503 to enter a data transmission and reception network 105 and performs scheduling relating to a period for a target of medium access control in which the master device 101 can perform scheduling of a polling period for requesting a period for transmitting user data to the master device 101 from the slave device 104503 and a user data transmission period for transmitting the user data to the master device 101 from the slave device 104503 thereby notifying the slave device 104503 which is allowed to enter of a result of the scheduling wherein the slave device 104503 waits for the polling period in the period for the target of medium access control in accordance with the scheduling transmits a message for requesting the user data transmission period to the master device 101 and then transmits the user data in the user data transmission period that is scheduled by the master device 101 as a result of the polling operation wherein the master device 101 can change allocation of the polling period in the period for the target of medium access control andwherein a communication between the master device 101 and the slave device 104503 is performed using a periodic frame including both a period during which there is a possibility that a data transmitted from the slave device 104503 competes and a period during which an occupancy for each slave is recognized the association request message of the slave device 104503 for requesting to allow the entrance is transmitted in the period during which there is the possibility of competition and the requesting of the period for transmitting the user data is not performed in the period during which there is the possibility of competition but performed in the period during which the occupancy is recognized.
Analyze the text for negations and identify their types.
